resources.string: PushFit is an application that helps you count the number of push ups you\'ve done in a day. with PushFit, you can customize how frequently you want to workout.

"Place your device just under your head and click the start button to start recording your push ups. There are two options; With the Countdown Timer option selected, when the time you specified ends, the number of push ups you recorded will be saved automatically. For Sensor Counter, you set the minimum number of push ups you can do, when you reach the specified amount of push ups, you\'ll be notified and the push ups recorded. "
